title: Are You the One? El Match Perfecto
text:
Are You the One? El Match Perfecto is a Mexican <a href="reality%20television%20series">reality television series</a> on <a href="MTV%20%28Latin%20America%29">MTV Latin America</a>. It is a Mexican version of the original American series. It follows 20 people who are living together in a tropical destination to find their perfect match. If the 10 men and 10 women are able to correctly choose all ten perfect matches in ten weeks, they will win $200 thousand to split among them. Each episode the cast will pair up with whoever they believe their perfect match is to compete in a challenge. The winners of the challenge will go on a <a href="Dating">date</a>, and have a chance to test their match in the truth booth. The cast members will choose one of the winning couples to go to the truth booth to determine if they are a perfect match or not. This is the only way to confirm matches. Each episode ends with a matching ceremony where the couples will be told how many perfect matches they have, but not which matches are correct. It debuted in September 2016 on <a href="MTV%20%28Latin%20America%29">MTV Latin America</a>.
Season 1.
Season one premiered on September 20, 2016. Filmed in Dominican Republic.
Progress.
 Confirmed Perfect Match Unconfirmed Perfect Match
Season 2.
In November 2017, a second season of Are You The One: The Perfect Match was announced, which will premiere in 2018. The second season was filmed in <a href="Trancoso%2C%20Bahia">Trancoso, Bahia</a> and premiered on MTV Latin America on February 12, 2018. It was hosted by Mexican actor <a href="Vadhir%20Derbez">Vadhir Derbez</a>. Israel Rudovsky previously competed in <a href="Big%20Brother%20M%C3%A9xico%20%28season%204%29">Big Brother Mexico</a>. Quetzalli Bulnes was part of the <a href="Mexico%27s%20Next%20Top%20Model%20%28season%202%29">second season</a> of <a href="Mexico%27s%20Next%20Top%20Model">Mexico's Next Top Model</a>, while Talía Loaiza stands out for having been part of <a href="Acapulco%20Shore">Acapulco Shore</a>.
Progress.

 Confirmed Perfect Match
Truth Booths.
After Filming.
Clovis Nienow was later a cast member on "<a href="Resistir%C3%A9%20%28Chilean%20TV%20series%29">Resistiré</a>". Dianey Sahagún appeared on the first season of the <a href="La%20Venganza%20de%20los%20Ex">Mexican version</a> of the reality show "<a href="Ex%20on%20the%20Beach%20%28British%20TV%20series%29">Ex on the Beach</a>".
